Apps for Good APP NAME Press to give feedback APP LOGO What language should the book be written in? Who is your favorite author? What book length do you prefer? What publication time period do you prefer?
On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does author impact your book preferences? On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does length impact your book preferences? On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does publication year impact your book preferences? On a scale of 0 (not at all) to 10 (essential), how much does average rating impact your book preferences?
